Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: I see that you started working on your shop. It looks great so far. I'm really looking forward to it being finished

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: As you can see, not much else has changed around here.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: However, I get a feeling that your shop will bring new visitors. Only time will tell.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Until then, I'll let you get back to work. Don't push yourself too hard and remember to go back to your tent to rest up.
